XUI Treeview component

Usage:

<xui-treeview model="reference" options="expression" context="reference"></xui-treeview>
Attributes:
model Value containing list of nodes to be used as data for the treeview.
options

Object containing values for treeview configuration. Used keys:

childrenKey: key to be used to extract children from node (default "children")

onExpand: callback for node expansion

onCollapse: callback for node collapse

onSelect: callback for node selection

onDblClick: callback for double clicking on node

selectionMode: selection mode - possible values: null (default), 'single', 'multi'

trackBy: string what specifies a property on the node for trackBy functionality. If it is not specified or doesn't exist, the $index will be used as default
context

Object used to store data regarding treeview state. Used keys:

focusedNode: focused virtual node

selectedNode: selected virtual node (for selectionMode = 'single')

selectedNodes: list of selected nodes (for selectionMode = 'multi')
Keyboard controls:
up focus previous visible node
down focus next visible node
left collapse node with children / focus parent node
right expand node with children / focus first child node
* expand all under current node
+ expand current node
- collapse current node
shift+plus expand all nodes
shift+minus collapse all nodes
